articles.author: Jillian Deutsch
articles.title: Meta to Offer Ad-Free Facebook, Instagram Subscriptions in Europe - Bloomberg
articles.description: Meta Platforms Inc. will offer users in Europe ad-free access to Facebook and Instagram for a subscription fee after courts in the region began cracking down on the way social media companies treat data.
articles.content: Meta Platforms Inc. will offer users in Europe ad-free access to Facebook and Instagram for a subscription fee after courts in the region began cracking down on the way social media companies treat d… [+364 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S23 starts receiving Android 14 update - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung’s Android 14-based One UI 6 update is leaving beta on the Galaxy S23 in Europe. People are seeing the update in countries including the UK, France, and Germany.
